Cochise Linux Guy

About Linux Services

Linux is a wonderful alternative to Windows and the best part is its free!

Why Linux?

It's Fast

Linux comes without any bloat. By default it is quicker than Windows.

It's Secure

Linux is not a target for Viruses and Malware.

It's Customizable

Linux can be tuned for whatever hardware you would like to use.

It's Free!

Linux is free and open source. No more paying for upgrades!!!

More about Linux

Linux is Fast


Linux is Secure


Linux is Cusomizable

With hundreds of distributions to choose from that will install on everything from your android smart phone to a mainframe server. The posiblities are endless. Linux has a variety of choices for your laptop or desktop computer.

Linux is Free!

Linux is available to download directly from the internet for no charge. This has no strings attached and the code for linux is available freely on the web. This allows developers to continue to create the best experience possible.

Much More

Install Linux

Installing Linux can be a little intimidating. That is where I come in. I make the installation and configuration of Linux easy for you.

I can sit down with you, discuss what you want from Linux and choose the right Linux for you. Taking it one step further I can go over alternative software, configure any software you would like me to and get you off and running with your new Linux install.
